_sText:
Direct .bsp download: http://www.mediafire.com/?nnyy0zm0k5u

*Thanks to those who helped beta test and give ideas!*
**Special thanks to Dan for the night time idea!**
***Thanks to intoxgaming.com and the Brothers of Tragedy (66.55.158.155:27015) server for resources for testing!***


Changes:
Added buy zones (T buyzone is below spawn after floor opens)
Its at night (obviously) but not too dark.
Added gun toss guns with colored trails (available 1:30 after round start)
No door sounds (you could hear them throughout map like you were right next to it)
Changes in Plinko game:
  - Made activation T only (CT's get hurt if they stand on the pads)
  - Switch turns on game after 1:30 into round
  - Added K2 (kill 2 CT's) and K4 (kill 4 CT's) slots.
  - Tweaked space sizes to adjust for K2/4 (death slots larger)
  - Added sign (no, its not the watermelon game or "pachinko"

More changes that you need to figure out by yourself!
